entry.title: Sunday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries late this evening and overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 this evening. Temperature rising to minus 9 this evening then falling. Wind chill near minus 20. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday: Snow. High minus 8.
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. Becoming cloudy late in the afternoon then snow. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill minus 20 in the morning and minus 13 in the afternoon. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Snow. Low minus 10.
entry.summary: Snow. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 10. Wind chill minus 12 in the evening and minus 17 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Sunday 29 January 2023
